name: Etherlords
summary: Named “the most exciting turn-based strategy game on PC,” by CVG, Etherlords delivers a bold and exciting new gaming style that offers the best of turn-based strategy and trading card game play in one awesome adventure.
info:
• 中文名: 苍穹霸主
  • 开发: Nival Inc
  • 发行: Nival Inc
  • 平台: PC
  • 发行日期: 2001年11月8日
  • 官方网站: https://en.nival.com/games/pc-games/etherlords
